install.name: Art Universal Lightbox
install.author: Artetics
install.description:
Art Universal Lightbox: module to show image gallery with lightbox effect: sexy lightbox, colobox or pretty photo.


© Artetics.com - Start Point For Your Website.

param.name: path
param.label: Path to images folder
param.description: Path to images folder. Relative to Joomla! directory. If you would like to show images from JOOMLA_DIR/images/my_images then you should indicate path as images/my_images

param.name: thumbnailPath
param.label: Path to thumbnail folder
param.description: Path to thumbnail folder - if you would like to take thumbnails from specific folder. Relative to Joomla! directory. If you would like to show images from JOOMLA_DIR/images/my_images then you should indicate path as images/my_images

param.name: loadJQuery
param.label: Load jQuery library
param.description: Load jQuery javascript library? Choose no if it is always included in your pages

param.name: autoGenerateThumbs
param.label: Generate thumbnails
param.description: Automatically generate thumbnails saving aspect ratio or just resize images

param.name: convertImageOption
param.label: Convert image
param.description: Generate thumbnails using this convert option

param.name: numberOfImages
param.label: Number of images
param.description: Number of images to show. Leave empty for all images

param.name: singleOption
param.label: Show single image or text
param.option: Single thumbnail, all images in a lightbox

param.name: singleContent
param.label: Single image or text
param.description: Single image or text. Indicate random to show random single image

param.name: altTag
param.label: Alt tag for images
param.description: Alt tag for images. If empty then alt tags will be automatically generated
